scripts.test-slack: npm run clean-test-results-slack && (npx playwright test tests/smoke.spec.js --reporter=json > test-results.json || echo Test run failed) && node send-to-slack.js
scripts.with-allure-no-slack: npx rimraf allure-results allure-report && (npx playwright test tests/smoke.spec.js --reporter=line,allure-playwright || echo Test run failed) && npx allure generate ./allure-results -o ./allure-report --clean && npx allure open ./allure-report
